entries.name: Size
entries: You are Medium or Small. You choose the size when you gain this race.

entries.name: Hare-Trigger
entries: You add your proficiency bonus to your initiative rolls.

entries.name: Leporine Senses
entries: You have proficiency in the {@skill Perception} skill.

entries.name: Lucky Footwork
entries: When you fail a Dexterity saving throw, you can use your reaction to roll a {@dice d4} and add it to the result, potentially turning the failure into a success.

entries.name: Rabbit Hop
entries: Once during each of your turns when you walk at least 5 feet, you can hop, rolling a {@dice d12} and moving that many feet in a direction of your choice. This extra distance doesn't cost movement, but you can hop only if your speed isn't 0.
